Class DeleteDeliveryCommand

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.controller.DeleteDeliveryCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class DeleteDeliveryCommand extends Object implements Command
The DeleteDeliveryCommand class implements the Command interface and provides functionality to delete a delivery request from a delivery round. It also allows undoing the deletion, restoring the deleted request.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Integer
    courierId
    The ID of the courier associated with the delivery request, if applicable.
    private DeliveryRequest
    deletedRequest
    Stores the delivery request that was deleted for undo functionality.
    private final String
    deliveryRequestId
    The unique identifier of the delivery request to be deleted.
    private final Round
    round
    The Round instance from which the delivery request will be deleted.
    private List<DeliveryTour>
    updatedTours
    Stores the updated list of delivery tours after the command is executed.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeleteDeliveryCommand

      public DeleteDeliveryCommand(Round round, String deliveryRequestId, Integer courierId)
      Constructs a new DeleteDeliveryCommand for a specific delivery request.
      Parameters:
      round - the Round from which the delivery request will be deleted
      deliveryRequestId - the ID of the delivery request to delete
      courierId - the ID of the courier associated with the delivery request

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the command by deleting the specified delivery request from the round. If a courier ID is provided, updates the delivery tours for the courier.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undoes the command by restoring the deleted delivery request to the round. If a courier ID is provided, updates the delivery tours for the courier.
      Specified by:
      undo in interface Command

    • getRound

      public Round getRound()
      Returns the Round instance associated with this command.
      Specified by:
      getRound in interface Command
      Returns:
      the Round where the delivery request was deleted

    • getUpdatedTours

      public List<DeliveryTour> getUpdatedTours()
      Returns the updated list of delivery tours after the command was executed.
      Returns:
      the updated list of DeliveryTour
